Author: livipup
Text: I eat with my family, but I tend to eat smaller portions than everyone else.

Author: pathetic-noose
Text: I avoid eating in front of others as much as possible and I haven’t eaten a full meal in front of my mom in over a year. I will heavily restrict when she comes home & just make up lies like “yeah I already ate, I’m sooooo full” & then she makes her own dinner for herself. But it does make me feel horrible when she says that she’s sick of cooking for just herself & wishes I’d join her. If I do eat what she cooks, then I take it into my room so she isn’t watching me eat it.
